thread.title: Charles Talbot
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Charles Talbot

author: Charles Talbot
title: Charles Talbot
text: Reserving on line, after filling out all the boxes, including credit card information, I was told that room not available. No other rooms offered instead. So when I tried again, none of my information had been saved, although another suite at the same price was available. Online process quite annoying.
